Institute for Advanced StudiesDedicated to creating a collaborative and inspiring environment.

Institute for SpaceAddressing some of the most pressing space sector and global sustainability challenges.
Institute for Structural and Chemical BiologyUsing chemistry to develop probes and tools to explore biological systems.

text: The University of Leicester received a gold rating in Teaching Excellence Framework 2023. This means our student experience and student outcomes are typically outstanding.
